author: Cleve R. Wootson Jr. and Lori Rozsa, The Washington Post
title: Florida Gov. derides those 'bringing the virus' from hot zone...
description: ORLANDO, Fla. - Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis, a Republican, spent Tuesday amplifying his order requiring fliers from the New York area to self-isolate for two weeks upon arrival in the Sunshine State, arguing that travelers from coronavirus hot zones would "seed…
